title: Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item does not get selected.

Observed Behavior: When I try to select a label item in the library outline view for the first time, the item does not get selected.

Expected Behavior: I expect the label item to be selected when I click on it in the library outline view.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Select the label item in the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item again in the library outline view, now it gets selected.
